scripts.build: node index & cp src/style.css src/CNAME dist
scripts.deploy: cd dist && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && cd dist && git add --all && git commit -m 'Build'
scripts.postinstall: rm -rf dist && git clone -b gh-pages https://github.com/yuheiy/gallery.yhey.me.git dist
